title: I Want to Play with You
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>Thank you for inviting me today. It was a wonderful piano concert<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Thank you for hanging out with me too. I'm glad you like it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>It’s inspiring to see and hear something so lovely, isn’t it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Maki-chan, would you like to come over and play piano with me after this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I was hoping to be able to play piano with you again, Maki-chan….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>….Do you have sheet music?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>! Yes! That is if you’re fine with Schubert. You can play the Primo, Maki-chan. I’ll play the Secondo<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Fufu, how impatient. We can decide that after looking at the sheet music, no?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yaay! Thank you, Maki-chan! Then, let’s go immediately!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
